name: 12 Mile India Pale Lager
description: A unique fusion of spirited new world hops balanced with a special lager yeast creates a cultured body with tropical fruit citrus notes. This India Pale Lager is ideal for both IPA and Lager aficionados.

brand: Sons Of Kent Brewing Company L
name: 1792 English Ale
description: Traditional English Ale brewed with Maris Otter, and East Kent Goldings. Malt forward with a noble hop aroma.

name: 5 Oclock Shadow Pale Ale
description: Full Beard Brewing’s 5 O’Clock Shadow is a clean, crisp pale ale with a hint of bitterness. Aimed to be an ideal restaurant/pub beer with flavours that won’t get lost while eating.

name: 5 Paddles Brewing Home Sweet Home
description: An American wheat style beer, brewed with vanilla and honey malt, we called this beer “Home Sweet Home” because nothing says home quite like the scents of honey and vanilla…or cracking open a beer.

name: 5 Paddles Brewing In Your Face IPA
description: West coast style IPA brewed with a generous blend of hops. Fruity, crisp and bitter with notes of grapefruit and citrus. Neutral malt and yeast flavours allows you to experience all the hoppy goodness!

name: 8 Track IPA
description: 8-Track IPA is a classic west coast style, bursting with tangy hops, and juicy tropical flavours.

name: 8th Sin Black Lager
description: A killer blend of 8 roasted malts. Bittersweet and highly drinkable with hints of chocolate, espresso and a slight hop presence.

name: Abe Erb 1857 Kolsch-style Ale
description: 1857 KOLSCH-STYLE LAGERED ALE: 1857 is our rendition of the classic Cologne ale that blends the line between ale and lager. Soft notes of German Pils malt compliment the subtle and smooth crisp finish.Lightly hopped and balanced by delicate esters of traditional Kolsch yeast.

name: Abe Erb Das Spritzhaus Hefeweizen
description: A fresh, medium bodied wheat beer, notes of banana and a flavourful finish with hints of clove.

name: Ace Hill Light Lager
description: A craft version of a Mexican style light beer. Described as a Mexican-style lager, boasts high quality flaked corn to give an extra smooth body and Wakatu hop for character.

name: Ace Hill Pilsner
description: The Ace Hill Pilsner is a perfectly simple premium beer. With modern good looks, award-winning quality and a smooth, easy-drinking taste, it’s a beer that stands out anytime, anywhere. Proudly brewed locally in Ontario.

name: Ace Hill Radler
description: A refreshing Radler made with our Pilsner and organic citrus juice.

name: Ace Hill Vienna Lager
description: An easy-drinking Vienna-style amber lager with slow roasted caramel malts and a fine balance of character and smoothness.

name: Against The Grain Golden Lager
description: Against the Grain is a clean, refreshing lager brewed in the German Helles style. Crisp with a medium dry finish, a slight malt swee

name: Alberta Genuine Draft
description: Alberta Genuine Draft is brewed using only 100% Alberta grown barley malt, select hops, Rocky Mountain water and special lager yeast. It has a crisp, clean, thirst quenching flavour with no after-taste.
